name: CDA Release 6.0.0
description: In this release, we bring a couple of new Cloud Directory APIs and an enhancement.

ADDED.text:
Now, you can pass API Key and API Secret in the header of the following APIs:
- Insights
- Custom Object
- Identity
- Custom Object with Identity

The following two new APIs are added under Cloud Directory APIs. Using these APIs you can retrieve consumerâ€™s profile data along with their custom Object data in a single API.
- User Identity with Custom Object
- Get User Identity with Custom Object by Page
